actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to remove certain limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the U.S. section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Removes the appropriation limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the United States section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain limitations on annual operation and maintenance expenditures applicable to the U.S. section of the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico, and for other purposes.
